attributes.action: pursue vigorously, as a matter of environmental urgency, the implementation of road user charges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Road user charges are urgently needed to reduce pollution and congestion. Allowances can be made for rural motorists, the disabled, and those who depend on driving for their living, but all should pay a reasonable amount for the damage they do to the environment, which belongs to us all.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
